H0.text: What is entombed in a cenotaph. The remains of a notable historical figure

H1.text: What is entombed in a cenotaph. A symbolic representation of the deceased

H2.text: What is entombed in a cenotaph. The ashes of a cremated individual

H3.text: What is entombed in a cenotaph. Nothin

A4.text: A cenotaph is an empty grave, tomb or a monument erected in honor of a person or group of people whose remains are elsewhere or have been lost.

A5.text: It can also be the initial tomb for a person who has since been reinterred elsewhere.
